attributes.action: COVID 19 Remembrance Day . Official bank holiday.
attributes.additional_details: A day of remembrance in respect for all those who have sadly died from COVID 19 and  celebration for all those who have worked so hard on behalf of the country like  NHS workers ,care home staff ,bus drivers ,postal workers ,shop staff and all keys workers . A day for all to reflect on what this country and the world has gone through.
attributes.background: The country has gone through and is going  through an event that will forever be in our minds that needs to be remembered for all time.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

A national holiday and day of remembrance for those lost in the COVID pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568631
